metadata.rationale: Extracted from canonical script and scene co-occurrence data.

data.description: Tennessee, known as 'Tennie' to everyone except his mother, is a desk associate or tech support figure at the 2nd Level Trading Pit. He is introduced already at Dante's desk, typing madly on her computer before she even settles in, suggesting he is efficient, task-focused, and deeply embedded in the fast-paced rhythm of the trading floor. He is notably unsociable, barely acknowledging Dante's presence and only responding when directly addressed, and even then without looking up from the screen.
data.dialogue_summary: Tennessee has a single line of dialogue in which he corrects Dante's use of his full name, stating that only his mother calls him 'Tennessee' and that he prefers 'Tennie.' He delivers this without looking up from the computer screen, underscoring his detached, task-oriented demeanor.

explicit_evidence.quote: Tennie. Only my mom calls me by my full name.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: INT. 2ND LEVEL TRADING PIT - DANTE'S DESK

inferred_traits.rationale: Tennessee is already typing madly on Dante's computer before she even sits down, and does not acknowledge her presence until she speaks to him directly, suggesting deep absorption in his work.
He does not look up from the computer screen even when responding to Dante, and seems 'barely aware of anyone's presence,' indicating a preference for task over social interaction.
His insistence on being called 'Tennie' rather than 'Tennessee' suggests a casual, self-defined identity and mild assertiveness about personal boundaries.
He is already set up and working at Dante's desk before she arrives, consistent with the general fast pace of the trading floor environment and Greta's instruction that he would 'get her set up.'

data.name: TENNESSEE

relationships.evidence: Greta instructs that 'Tennie will get you set up,' and Tennessee is found already working at Dante's computer when she arrives.
Greta refers Dante to Tennessee by saying 'Tennie will get you set up,' indicating a working relationship.

scene_presence: INT. 2ND LEVEL TRADING PIT - DANTE'S DESK
